changeSet.author: system
changeSet.comment: Add STATUS_CHANGE operation type for tracking Planka card moves
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE rfc_history DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS chk_rfc_history_operation;
ALTER TABLE rfc_history ADD CONSTRAINT chk_rfc_history_operation CHECK (operation IN ('CREATE', 'UPDATE', 'DELETE', 'STATUS_CHANGE'));
COMMENT ON COLUMN rfc_history.operation IS 'Тип операции: CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE, STATUS_CHANGE (изменение статуса через Planka)';
